name: Notion Dopamine Detox Template
description: Hi there, I created a Notion dopamine detox template that I'm happy to share with you. It's a simple tool to help you plan and track your dopamine detox and reflect on your progress.A dopamine detox is a period of time where we reduce dopamine-releasing activities. The goal is to reset our brain's reward system and make it more responsive to natural pleasures. Today, we live in a digital world where we are constantly bombarded with notifications, messages, and updates, and it can take a lot of w
features: 4 Dopamine Detox Template Designs; 2 Monk Mode Template Designs; Monk Mode + Journal Template; Review Template for Dopamine Detox and Monk Mode; Design Materials: Wallpapers, Icons, etc.
